title: Team Logos - Preview
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is viewing a matchup tile on the Watch or Games page
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ A game is in a preview state
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The Away team (Logo, Colors, and Team-code) will be displayed on the left

AND

+ The Home team (Logo, Colors, Team-code) will be located on the right

AND

+ "@" will be in the center

title: Team Logos - Live
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

The user is viewing a matchup tile on the Watch or Games page
custom_steps:
WHEN

A game is Live and in-progress
custom_expected:
THEN

The Away team (Logo, Colors, and Team-code) will be displayed on the left

AND

The Home team (Logo, Colors, Team-code) will be located on the right

AND 

The score will be in the center (Ex: 0-0, 5-4)

title: Live Tag
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

A feed is available for a game that is in-progres
custom_expected:
THEN

The "Live" tag will be available (Red background, white text)

title: Pitcher & Batter (Live)
custom_steps:
WHEN 

The user views the game tile on the hero, games carousel, or games page
custom_expected:
THEN

The pitcher's last name will be displayed next to "P"

AND

Under the pitcher will be the current batter's last name displayed next to "AB"

title: Pitcher & Batter (Archive)
custom_steps:
WHEN 

The user views the game tile on the hero, games carousel, or games page
custom_expected:
THEN

The winning pitcher's last name will be located next to "W" under "FINAL"

AND

The losing pitcher's last name will be located next to "L" under the winning pitcher

title: Inning
custom_steps:
WHEN 

The user views the game tile from the Hero, Games Carousel, or Games page
custom_expected:
THEN

The inning will be displayed on the game tile
(Ex: T1 or B2)

title: Preview State
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

A game is in the preview state
custom_steps:
WHEN

The user views the game tile on the Hero, Games Carousel, or Games Page
custom_expected:
THEN

The user will see the start time displayed above the projected starting pitchers

AND

The Bases and Outs icons will be greyed out

title: Runners and Outs
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

A game is Live and in-progress
custom_steps:
WHEN

The user views the game tile from the Hero, Games Carousel, and Games page

AND

There are runners on base or outs in the inning
custom_expected:
THEN

Any runners on base will display on the infield icon in yellow

AND

Any outs recorded will switch the circle icon from grey to white

title: Lock Icon
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

The user is not-entitled to one or both feeds available in the feed picker
custom_steps:
WHEN

The user views the game tile from the Hero, Games Carousel and Games page
custom_expected:
THEN 

A lock icon is displayed on the game tile or Hero

AND

The broadcast is disabled and cannot be selected

title: MVPD Pill
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

The user observes a game tile (Ex: ASG)

AND

The game is only available for users with mvpd auth credentials linked to their account
custom_steps:
WHEN

The user views the game tile from the Hero, Games Carousel and Games page
custom_expected:
THEN

The user will see the MVPD Required pill displayed

title: Blackout Pill
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

A logged-in user is in a location where a local team is blacked out

OR

The logged-in user is attempting to view a National game that is blacked out
custom_steps:
WHEN

The user views the game tile from the Hero, Games Carousel and Games page
custom_expected:
THEN

A blackout icon is displayed on the game tile

AND

Tapping on the game tile will display the blackout message

title: Pre-game State
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is viewing a game tile that has broadcast options available on the Home and Games pages
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ There is a pregame show available on one or both broadcasts
custom_expected:
THEN

The user will observe:

- [TEAM] Pregame Show/s copy while the pregame show is in-progress
- A "LIVE" tag once game is in warm-up state (pregame show may still be airing)
- First batter with name, picture, and stats at the start of the game
- Team Logos, Team abbreviations, and records
- A Score of 0-0 
- Gray/Unfilled bases 
- Gray/Unfilled outs counter
- Apple TV+ pill if necessary
- MLB.tv Free Game of the Day pill if necessary

title: Live Game State
custom_steps:
WHEN 

+ Observing the game tile on the Home page or Games page
custom_expected:
THEN 

The user will observe:

- The Away team's logo, tri-code, and record on the left side
- The Home team's logo, tri-code, and record on the right side
- A lock icon if the user is not entitled to the broadcasts
- A LIVE tag next to the game inning
- Pitcher headshot, "P", Last Name, and Stats
- Batter headshot, "AB", Last Name, and Stats
- Bases and Outs markers
- Occupied Bases and Outs will be displayed in yellow
- Free Game of the Day pill if applicable
- MVPD required pill if applicable
- Partnership pill if applicable

title: Post-game State
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ A game is FINAL

AND

+ The user is navigating through the Home page or Games page
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The Team Logos, Tri-code, and records will display, with the home team on the right.

AND

+ The final score will be displayed between the two teams

AND

+ FINAL copy will be displayed above the:

- Winning pitcher headshot
- "W" and pitcher's last name
- Game stats

AND

- Losing pitcher headshot
- "L" and pitcher's last name
- Game stats

AND

+ The bases and outs will be grey

AND

+ If the game was the Free Game of the Day, MVPD, Streaming on a Partner app, the pill will display

AND

+ A lock icon will display if the user is NOT entitled

AND

+ If the game tile is selected, the broadcast options will display

AND

+ The user can launched the condensed game or recap, but the game feeds will be locked

OR 

+ If entitled, the user is able to successfully launch the Away, Home feeds

title: Delayed Game State
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ A live game has been delayed

OR

+ A game in pregame state has been delayed
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Observing the game tile on the Home page or Games page
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The game status will display " DELAYED " copy and reasoning

title: Postponed Game State
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ A live game has been delayed

OR

+ A game in pregame state has been delayed
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Observing the game tile on the Home page or Games page
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The game status will display " POSTPONED " copy and reasoning

title: Suspended Game State
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ A live game has been delayed

OR

+ A game in pregame state has been delayed
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Observing the game tile on the Home page or Games page
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The game status will display "SUSPENDED" copy and reasoning

title: Pregame Show Available
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is viewing a game tile from the following areas in the app:

- Games Page
- Broadcast Options in Scoreboard (Live or Archived Video Player)
- Home Page (Hero and carousels)
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ One broadcast has a pregame show available 

OR 

+ Both broadcasts have pregame shows available
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The tile will display a tag or copy that informs the user that there is a pregame show available to view

AND

+ Launching the game will play the pregame show from the live point

title: Postgame Show Available
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is viewing a game tile from the following areas in the app:

- Games Page
- Broadcast Options in Scoreboard (Live or Archived Video Player)
- Home Page (Hero and carousels)
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ One broadcast has a postgame show available 

OR 

+ Both broadcasts have postgame shows available
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The tile will display a tag or copy that informs the user that there is a postgame show available to view

AND

+ Launching the game will play the postgame show from the live point
